To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `RequestQueueSingelton` which has field `mCtx` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak (and also breaks Instant Run)
